title: Ford condemns Derry bomb attack on community (Northern Ireland Executive)
text: ( Source : Northern Ireland Executive ) Justice Minister David Ford has said the bomb left at the Waterfoot Hotel was an attack on the community. ~ Saturday, 10 October 2015 David Ford said: 'It is clear that whoever left this device was
